text: Pawee Tanthatemee (, born 22 October 1996) is a Thai professional footballer who plays as a centre back for Thai League 1 club Ratchaburi Mitr Phol and the Thailand national team. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
